verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Heaven is My throne and earth is My footstool. Where is the house you will build for Me? Who of you will hear the cry of My heart? Where will My resting place be?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Here, Oh Lord, have I prepared for You a home. Long have I desired for You to dwell. Here, Oh Lord, have I prepared a resting place. Here, Oh Lord, I wait for You alone.{/lang-eng}
